import React from 'react' import ReactImagePickerEditor, { ImagePickerConf } from 'react-image-picker-editor'; import 'react-image-picker-editor/dist/index.css' export default function CreatePost(props) { const config: ImagePickerConf = { borderRadius : '8px', language : 'en', width : '500px', height: '500px', objectFit: 'contain', compressInitial: null, hideDownloadBtn: true, } return ( <>
event.key === 'Escape' ? props.togglePost() : ""}>
< ReactImagePickerEditor config={config} />
) }
